item.description:
Notes: This is not a meetup event. Acara Yoga Studio and Ann are co-sponsoring this event for all who wish to participate. We're sharing this opportunity and experience with you, as it is always an easy way to align and to feel gooooood; and this is how you allow all that you desire to come to you.

The selection this evening will be focused on getting into feeling good states.


  • We'll be doing one meditation on feeling gratitude and abundance.
  • A very powerful meditation on changing your inner "story" (inner narrative) from inside the Vortex (connected to Spirit/Source)
  • And one called, "Floating and feeling good"


    ***If you like, you can bring a mat, blanket, and pillow to fully relax lying down. Or you can use the what's available there, too, of course. Please arrive a little early to get settled (around 7:05).


    All are welcome. The class is appropriate whether you are a beginner to meditating, or experienced. Please invite others to sign up and join you! Forward this to your friends, family and groups.


    We were filled to capacity last two times at Acara, so either RSVP'ing thru this site, or registration is required. Non- meetup people should register by sending name, e-mail, and phone number to: annide@newpossibilitiescoaching.com. Theyâ€™ll receive confirmation of their registration and a reminder.

    Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Rt. 9 to 85 south exit (Hopkinton/Milford); turn rt. onto MA-85 (Cordaville Rd.); studio is in Town Centre Plaza on left, next to Middlesex Savings Bank. Acara Yoga sign is on door.""

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: FREE Evening of Guided Meditations for the Community
